resolution.description: A numeric specifying the width in basepairsof each pixel

zrange.description: A numeric vector of length 2 specifying the range ofinteraction scores to plot, where extreme values will be set to themax or min

norm.description: A character value specifying hic data normalization method,if giving

matrix.description: A character value indicating the type of matrix to output

chrom.description: A string representing the chromosome of region to be plotted

chromstart.description: A integer start position on chromosome to be plotted

chromend.description: A integer end position on chromosome to be plotted

assembly.description: A string representing the eefault genome assembly or a\link[plotgardener]{assembly} object

palette.description: A function describing the color palette to use forrepresenting scale of interaction scores

colorTrans.description: A string specifying how to scale Hi-C colors

flip.description: A logical indicating whether to flip the orientation ofthe Hi-C matrix over the x-axis

bg.description: A character value indicating background color

x.description: A numeric or unit object specifying rectangleHi-C plot x-location

y.description: A numeric, unit object, or character containing a "b" combinedwith a numeric value specifying rectangle Hi-C plot y-location

width.description: A numeric or unit object specifying the width of theHi-C plot rectangle

height.description: A numeric or unit object specifying the height of theHi-C plot rectangle

just.description: A string specifying the justification of rectangle Hi-C plot relative toits (x, y) location

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to useif \code{x}, \code{y}, \code{width}, or \code{height} are only givenas numerics

draw.description: A logical value indicating whether graphics output shouldbe produced

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} object containingrelevant function parameters

quiet.description: A logical indicating whether or not to print messages
